org.s2let
Class SphericalHarmonicTransform

java.lang.Object
  org.s2let.SphericalHarmonicTransform

public class SphericalHarmonicTransform
extends Object

Public class for storing a spherical harmonic transform, i.e. its harmonic coefficients and the relevant parameters.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getCoefficients

public org.bridj.Pointer<org.bridj.ComplexDouble> getCoefficients()
Getter for the data structure of the spherical harmonic coefficients.

Returns:
the harmonic coefficients, i.e. an array of complex doubles

getBandlimit

public int getBandlimit()
Getter for the bandlimit of the decomposition.

Returns:
the bandlimit

getReality

public boolean getReality()
Getter for the reality flag.

Returns:
true iff f(l,-m) = (-1)^m * CONG(f(l,m))

zeros

public static SphericalHarmonicTransform zeros(int bandlimit)
Factory method to construct a spherical harmonic decomposition of given bandlimit filled with zeros.

Parameters:
bandlimit - the bandlimit of the decomposition
Returns:
a new instance of an empty spherical harmonic decomposition of given bandlimit

random

public static SphericalHarmonicTransform random(int bandlimit)
Factory method to construct a spherical harmonic decomposition of given bandlimit filled with random complex numbers.

Parameters:
bandlimit - the bandlimit of the decomposition
Returns:
a new instance of a random (complex) spherical harmonic decomposition of given bandlimit

randomReal

public static SphericalHarmonicTransform randomReal(int bandlimit)
Factory method to construct a real spherical harmonic decomposition of given bandlimit filled with random complex numbers (but corresponding to a real signal, i.e. with f(l,-m) = (-1)^m * CONG(f(l,m))).

Parameters:
bandlimit - the bandlimit of the decomposition
Returns:
a new instance of a random (real) spherical harmonic decomposition of given bandlimit

maxAbsoluteDifferenceWith

public double maxAbsoluteDifferenceWith(org.bridj.Pointer<org.bridj.ComplexDouble> f2)
Method for comparing the current decomposition with another spherical harmonic decomposition of identical band limit, return the maximum absolute difference (comparing complex numbers two by two).

Parameters:
f2 - another spherical harmonic decomposition of same bandlimit
Returns:
the maximum absolute difference

maxAbsoluteDifferenceWith

public double maxAbsoluteDifferenceWith(SphericalHarmonicTransform f2)
Method for comparing the current decomposition with another spherical harmonic decomposition of identical band limit, return the maximum absolute difference (comparing complex numbers two by two).

Parameters:
f2 - another spherical harmonic decomposition of same bandlimit
Returns:
the maximum absolute difference

fromHarmonics

public static SphericalHarmonicTransform fromHarmonics(org.bridj.Pointer<org.bridj.ComplexDouble> flm)
Factory method to create an instance of spherical harmonic transform from the complex coefficients.

Parameters:
flm - the spherical harmonic coefficients
Returns:
a new instance of SphericalHarmonicTransform

fromMap

public static SphericalHarmonicTransform fromMap(PixelizedMap f)
Factory method to create an instance of spherical harmonic transform from a pixelized map. The spherical harmonic coefficients will be calculated in the map itself, using native methods from S2LET.

Parameters:
f - a pixelized map, i.e. either a MW or a Healpix map
Returns:
a new instance of SphericalHarmonicTransform

fromMap

public static SphericalHarmonicTransform fromMap(PixelizedMap f,
                                                 int bandlimit)
Factory method to create an instance of spherical harmonic transform from a pixelized map at a given bandlimit. The spherical harmonic coefficients will be calculated in the map itself, using native methods from S2LET.

Parameters:
f - a pixelized map, i.e. either a MW or a Healpix map
bandlimit - the bandlimit for the decomposition to create (important for Healpix maps)
Returns:
a new instance of SphericalHarmonicTransform

fromWavelets

public static SphericalHarmonicTransform fromWavelets(AxisymmetricWaveletTransform f_wav)
Factory method to create an instance of spherical harmonic transform from a wavelet transform. The spherical harmonic coefficients will be calculated in the map itself, using native methods from S2LET.

Parameters:
f_wav - a axisymmetric wavelet transform
Returns:
a new instance of SphericalHarmonicTransform
